chapters.title: Chapter 28: Night in Hinderstap
chapters.info: Fen Mizar, p. 429—One of Joline's Warders. He has dark, tilted eyes and a pointed chin. His hair is straight and black. He now travels with Mat's entourage and Valan Luca's show. He grew up in the Borderlands. See also Maza, Joline; Negina, Blaeric.
